Then all Israel<S>3478</S> gathered<S>6908</S> themselves to David<S>1732</S> unto Hebron<S>2275</S>, saying<S>559</S>, Behold, we are thy bone<S>6106</S> and thy flesh<S>1320</S>.
And moreover in time<S>8543</S> past<S>8032</S>, even when Saul<S>7586</S> was king<S>4428</S>, thou wast he that leddest out<S>3318</S> and broughtest in<S>935</S> Israel<S>3478</S>: and the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> said<S>559</S> unto thee, Thou shalt feed<S>7462</S> my people<S>5971</S> Israel<S>3478</S>, and thou shalt be ruler<S>5057</S> over my people<S>1571</S> Israel<S>3478</S>. <sup>in time: Heb. both yesterday and the third day</sup> <sup>feed: or, rule</sup>
Therefore came<S>935</S> all the elders<S>2205</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> to the king<S>4428</S> to Hebron<S>2275</S>; and David<S>1732</S> made<S>3772</S> a covenant<S>1285</S> with them in Hebron<S>2275</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>; and they anointed<S>4886</S> David<S>1732</S> king<S>4428</S> over Israel<S>3478</S>, according to the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> by<S>3027</S> Samuel<S>8050</S>. <sup>by: Heb. by the hand of</sup>
And David<S>1732</S> and all Israel<S>3478</S> went<S>3212</S> to Jerusalem<S>3389</S>, which is Jebus<S>2982</S>; where the Jebusites<S>2983</S> were, the inhabitants<S>3427</S> of the land<S>776</S>.
And the inhabitants<S>3427</S> of Jebus<S>2982</S> said<S>559</S> to David<S>1732</S>, Thou shalt not come<S>935</S> hither. Nevertheless David<S>1732</S> took<S>3920</S> the castle<S>4686</S> of Zion<S>6726</S>, which is the city<S>5892</S> of David<S>1732</S>.
And David<S>1732</S> said<S>559</S>, Whosoever smiteth<S>5221</S> the Jebusites<S>2983</S> first<S>7223</S> shall be chief<S>7218</S> and captain<S>8269</S>. So Joab<S>3097</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Zeruiah<S>6870</S> went<S>5927</S> first<S>7223</S> up<S>5927</S>, and was chief<S>7218</S>. <sup>chief: Heb. head</sup>
And David<S>1732</S> dwelt<S>3427</S> in the castle<S>4679</S>; therefore they called<S>7121</S> it the city<S>5892</S> of David<S>1732</S>. <sup>it: that is, Zion</sup>
And he built<S>1129</S> the city<S>5892</S> round about<S>5439</S>, even from Millo<S>4407</S> round about<S>5439</S>: and Joab<S>3097</S> repaired<S>2421</S> the rest<S>7605</S> of the city<S>5892</S>. <sup>repaired: Heb. revived</sup>
So David<S>1732</S> waxed<S>3212</S> greater<S>1980</S> and greater<S>1419</S>: for the LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S> was with him. <sup>waxed: Heb. went in going and increasing</sup>
These also are the chief<S>7218</S> of the mighty men<S>1368</S> whom David<S>1732</S> had, who strengthened<S>2388</S> themselves with him in his kingdom<S>4438</S>, and with all Israel<S>3478</S>, to make him king<S>4427</S>, according to the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> concerning Israel<S>3478</S>. <sup>strengthened: or, held strongly with him</sup>
And this is the number<S>4557</S> of the mighty men<S>1368</S> whom David<S>1732</S> had; Jashobeam<S>3434</S>, an Hachmonite<S>2453</S>, the chief<S>7218</S> of the captains<S>7991</S> <S>7970</S>: he lifted up<S>5782</S> his spear<S>2595</S> against three<S>7969</S> hundred<S>3967</S> slain<S>2491</S> by him at one<S>259</S> time<S>6471</S>. <sup>an Hachmonite: or, son of Hachmoni</sup>
And after<S>310</S> him was Eleazar<S>499</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Dodo<S>1734</S>, the Ahohite<S>266</S>, who was one of the three<S>7969</S> mighties<S>1368</S>.
He was with David<S>1732</S> at Pasdammim<S>6450</S>, and there the Philistines<S>6430</S> were gathered together<S>622</S> to battle<S>4421</S>, where was a parcel<S>2513</S> of ground<S>7704</S> full<S>4392</S> of barley<S>8184</S>; and the people<S>5971</S> fled<S>5127</S> from before<S>6440</S> the Philistines<S>6430</S>. <sup>Pasdammim: also called, Ephesdammim I.Sam.17.1.</sup>
And they set<S>3320</S> themselves in the midst<S>8432</S> of that parcel<S>2513</S>, and delivered<S>5337</S> it, and slew<S>5221</S> the Philistines<S>6430</S>; and the LORD<S>3068</S> saved<S>3467</S> them by a great<S>1419</S> deliverance<S>8668</S>. <sup>set: or, stood</sup> <sup>deliverance: or, salvation</sup>
Now three<S>7969</S> of the thirty<S>7970</S> captains<S>7218</S> went down<S>3381</S> to the rock<S>6697</S> to David<S>1732</S>, into the cave<S>4631</S> of Adullam<S>5725</S>; and the host<S>4264</S> of the Philistines<S>6430</S> encamped<S>2583</S> in the valley<S>6010</S> of Rephaim<S>7497</S>. <sup>three: or, three captains over the thirty</sup>
And David<S>1732</S> was then in the hold<S>4686</S>, and the Philistines'<S>6430</S> garrison<S>5333</S> was then at Bethlehem<S>1035</S>.
And David<S>1732</S> longed<S>183</S>, and said<S>559</S>, Oh that one would give me drink<S>8248</S> of the water<S>4325</S> of the well<S>953</S> of Bethlehem<S>1035</S>, that is at the gate<S>8179</S>!
And the three<S>7969</S> brake through<S>1234</S> the host<S>4264</S> of the Philistines<S>6430</S>, and drew<S>7579</S> water<S>4325</S> out of the well<S>953</S> of Bethlehem<S>1035</S>, that was by the gate<S>8179</S>, and took<S>5375</S> it, and brought<S>935</S> it to David<S>1732</S>: but David<S>1732</S> would<S>14</S> not drink<S>8354</S> of it, but poured it out<S>5258</S> to the LORD<S>3068</S>,
And said<S>559</S>, My God<S>430</S> forbid<S>2486</S> it me, that I should do<S>6213</S> this thing<S>2063</S>: shall I drink<S>8354</S> the blood<S>1818</S> of these men<S>582</S> that have put their lives in jeopardy<S>5315</S>? for with the jeopardy of their lives<S>5315</S> they brought<S>935</S> it. Therefore he would<S>14</S> not drink<S>8354</S> it. These things did<S>6213</S> these three<S>7969</S> mightiest<S>1368</S>. <sup>that have: Heb. with their lives?</sup>
And Abishai<S>52</S> the brother<S>251</S> of Joab<S>3097</S>, he was chief<S>7218</S> of the three<S>7969</S>: for lifting up<S>5782</S> his spear<S>2595</S> against three<S>7969</S> hundred<S>3967</S>, he slew<S>2491</S> them, and had a name<S>8034</S> among the three<S>7969</S>.
Of the three<S>7969</S>, he was more honourable<S>3513</S> than the two<S>8147</S>; for he was their captain<S>8269</S>: howbeit he attained<S>935</S> not to the first three<S>7969</S>.
Benaiah<S>1141</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Jehoiada<S>3077</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of a valiant<S>2428</S> man<S>376</S> of Kabzeel<S>6909</S>, who had done many<S>7227</S> acts<S>6467</S>; he slew<S>5221</S> two<S>8147</S> lionlike men<S>739</S> of Moab<S>4124</S>: also he went down<S>3381</S> and slew<S>5221</S> a lion<S>738</S> in<S>8432</S> a pit<S>953</S> in a snowy<S>7950</S> day<S>3117</S>. <sup>who had: Heb. great of deeds</sup>
And he slew<S>5221</S> an Egyptian<S>4713</S>, a man<S>376</S> of great stature<S>4060</S>, five<S>2568</S> cubits<S>520</S> high; and in the Egyptian's<S>4713</S> hand<S>3027</S> was a spear<S>2595</S> like a weaver's<S>707</S> beam<S>4500</S>; and he went down<S>3381</S> to him with a staff<S>7626</S>, and plucked<S>1497</S> the spear<S>2595</S> out of the Egyptian's<S>4713</S> hand<S>3027</S>, and slew<S>2026</S> him with his own spear<S>2595</S>. <sup>great: Heb. measure</sup>
These things did<S>6213</S> Benaiah<S>1141</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Jehoiada<S>3077</S>, and had the name<S>8034</S> among the three<S>7969</S> mighties<S>1368</S>.
Behold<S>2009</S>, he was honourable<S>3513</S> among the thirty<S>7970</S>, but attained<S>935</S> not to the first three<S>7969</S>: and David<S>1732</S> set<S>7760</S> him over his guard<S>4928</S>.
Also the valiant men<S>1368</S> of the armies<S>2428</S> were, Asahel<S>6214</S> the brother<S>251</S> of Joab<S>3097</S>, Elhanan<S>445</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Dodo<S>1734</S> of Bethlehem<S>1035</S>,
Shammoth<S>8054</S> the Harorite<S>2033</S>, Helez<S>2503</S> the Pelonite<S>6397</S>, <sup>Shammoth: or, Shammah</sup> <sup>Harorite: or, Harodite</sup> <sup>Pelonite: or, Paltite</sup>
Ira<S>5896</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Ikkesh<S>6142</S> the Tekoite<S>8621</S>, Abiezer<S>44</S> the Antothite<S>6069</S>,
Sibbecai<S>5444</S> the Hushathite<S>2843</S>, Ilai<S>5866</S> the Ahohite<S>266</S>, <sup>Sibbecai: or, Mebunnai</sup> <sup>Ilai: or, Zalmon</sup>
Maharai<S>4121</S> the Netophathite<S>5200</S>, Heled<S>2466</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Baanah<S>1196</S> the Netophathite<S>5200</S>, <sup>Heled: or, Heleb</sup>
Ithai<S>863</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Ribai<S>7380</S> of Gibeah<S>1390</S>, that pertained to the children<S>1121</S> of Benjamin<S>1144</S>, Benaiah<S>1141</S> the Pirathonite<S>6553</S>,
Hurai<S>2360</S> of the brooks<S>5158</S> of Gaash<S>1608</S>, Abiel<S>22</S> the Arbathite<S>6164</S>, <sup>Hurai: or, Hiddai</sup> <sup>Abiel: or, Abialbon</sup>
Azmaveth<S>5820</S> the Baharumite<S>978</S>, Eliahba<S>455</S> the Shaalbonite<S>8170</S>,

Ahiam<S>279</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Sacar<S>7940</S> the Hararite<S>2043</S>, Eliphal<S>465</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Ur<S>218</S>, <sup>Sacar: or, Sharar</sup> <sup>Eliphal: or, Eliphelet</sup> <sup>Ur: or, Ahasbai</sup>
Hepher<S>2660</S> the Mecherathite<S>4382</S>, Ahijah<S>281</S> the Pelonite<S>6397</S>,

Zelek<S>6768</S> the Ammonite<S>5984</S>, Naharai<S>5171</S> the Berothite<S>1307</S>, the armourbearer<S>5375</S> <S>3627</S> of Joab<S>3097</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Zeruiah<S>6870</S>,

Eliel<S>447</S> the Mahavite<S>4233</S>, and Jeribai<S>3403</S>, and Joshaviah<S>3145</S>, the sons<S>1121</S> of Elnaam<S>493</S>, and Ithmah<S>3495</S> the Moabite<S>4125</S>,
